verses.verse: And it came to pass a <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H3117>time<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had given <S%H5117>rest<s%> unto <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from all their <S%H341>enemies<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, that <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> grew <S%H2204>old<s%> and <S%H935>stricken<s%> in <S%H3117>age<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and for their <S%H2205>elders<s%>, and for their <S%H7218>heads<s%>, and for their <S%H8199>judges<s%>, and for their <S%H7860>officers<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H2204>them<s%>, I am old and <S%H935>stricken<s%> in <S%H3117>age<s%>:

And you have <S%H7200>seen<s%> all that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> unto all these <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of <S%H3068>you<s%>; for the Lord your <S%H430>God<s%> is he that has fought for <S%H3898>you<s%>.

<S%H7200>Behold<s%>, I have <S%H5307>divided<s%> unto you by lot these <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H7604>remain<s%>, to be an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> for your <S%H7626>tribes<s%>, from <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, with all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that I have cut <S%H3772>off<s%>, even unto the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H3996>westward<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, he shall <S%H1920>expel<s%> them from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3423>you<s%>, and drive them from out of your <S%H6440>sight<s%>; and you shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> their <S%H776>land<s%>, as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has promised unto <S%H1696>you<s%>.

Be you therefore <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2388>courageous<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> and to <S%H6213>do<s%> all that is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, that you <S%H5493>turn<s%> not aside therefrom to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left<s%>;

That you <S%H935>come<s%> not among these <S%H1471>nations<s%>, these that <S%H7604>remain<s%> among <S%H2142>you<s%>; neither make mention of the <S%H8034>name<s%> of their <S%H430>gods<s%>, nor cause to <S%H7650>swear<s%> by <S%H5647>them<s%>, neither serve <S%H7812>them<s%>, nor bow yourselves unto them:
But <S%H1692>cleave<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, as you have <S%H6213>done<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has driven <S%H3423>out<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> you <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> and <S%H6099>strong<s%>: but as for <S%H376>you<s%>, no man has been able to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

<S%H259>One<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of you shall <S%H7291>chase<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%>: for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, he it is that <S%H3898>fights<s%> for <S%H1696>you<s%>, as he has promised you.
Take <S%H3966>good<s%> <S%H8104>care<s%> therefore unto <S%H5315>yourselves<s%>, that you <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.

Else if you do in any <S%H7725>wise<s%> go <S%H7725>back<s%>, and <S%H1692>cleave<s%> unto the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of these <S%H1471>nations<s%>, even these that <S%H7604>remain<s%> among <S%H2859>you<s%>, and shall make marriages with <S%H935>them<s%>, and go in unto them, and they to you:

<S%H3045>Know<s%> for a <S%H3045>certainty<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will no <S%H3254>more<s%> drive <S%H3423>out<s%> any of these <S%H1471>nations<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6341>you<s%>; but they shall be snares and <S%H4170>traps<s%> unto <S%H7850>you<s%>, and scourges in your <S%H6654>sides<s%>, and <S%H6796>thorns<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, until you <S%H6>perish<s%> from off this <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H127>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has given <S%H5414>you<s%>.

<S%H3117>And<s%>, behold, this day I am <S%H1980>going<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of all the <S%H776>earth<s%>: and you <S%H3045>know<s%> in all your <S%H3824>hearts<s%> and in all your <S%H5315>souls<s%>, that not <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> has <S%H5307>failed<s%> of all the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> concerning <S%H935>you<s%>; all are come to pass unto <S%H259>you<s%>, and not one <S%H1697>thing<s%> has failed <S%H5307>there<s%>.

Therefore it shall come to <S%H2896>pass<s%>, that as all good <S%H1697>things<s%> are <S%H935>come<s%> upon <S%H3068>you<s%>, which the Lord your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>promised<s%> <S%H3068>you<s%>; so shall the Lord <S%H935>bring<s%> upon you all <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%>, until he have <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> you from off this <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H127>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has given <S%H5414>you<s%>.

When you have <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, which he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H1980>you<s%>, and have gone and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> yourselves to <S%H639>them<s%>; then shall the anger of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> be <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H6>you<s%>, and you shall perish <S%H4120>quickly<s%> from off the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> which he has given unto <S%H5414>you<s%>.
